#labels Phase-Reference,Featured
#summary GEarthExtensions Class Reference

Defined in [http://code.google.com/p/earth-api-utility-library/source/browse/trunk/extensions/src/__init__.js src/__init__.js]

The root class/namespace hybrid for the Earth API extensions library. This class groups functionality into namespaces such as [GEarthExtensionsDomReference GEarthExtensions.dom] and [GEarthExtensionsFxReference GEarthExtensions.fx].

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

----
=Class Constructor=

==GEarthExtensions(pluginInstance)==

===Example:===

{{{
var gex = new GEarthExtensions(ge); // ge is an instance of GEPlugin
gex.dom.clearFeatures(); // gex is an instance of a class, and gex.dom
                         // is effectively a namespace grouping
                         // functionality
}}}

===Parameters:===
  * *pluginInstance* _{{{GEPlugin}}}_  The Google Earth Plugin instance to associate this [GEarthExtensionsReference GEarthExtensions] instance with.

----
=Static Methods=

==isInstanceOfEarthInterface(object, type)==

Defined in [http://code.google.com/p/earth-api-utility-library/source/browse/trunk/extensions/src/_globals_.js src/_globals_.js]

Determines whether or not the given object is directly an instance of the specified Earth API type.

===Parameters:===
  * *object* _{{{Object}}}_  The object to test.
  * *type* _{{{String}}}_  The Earth API type string, i.e. 'KmlPlacemark'
